column2: ${username}! Are you still with me? I hope your day is filled with happiness and joy!

column3: you bring a smile to my virtual face. Let's keep the positive vibes flowing!

column2: dear ${username}! Let's take a moment to celebrate the wonderful things happening around us.
Autobot ${username}. Our journey continues together. Let's keep moving forward!

column3: your resilience is inspiring. Allow my words to be a gentle reminder to stay connected and strong.
